name: Peck and Call
description:
The Phoenix, guardian of the forest, has begun her life anew. For years you, the Stone Golem, have watched over her egg atop the mountain. One day, she rumbles from within and the egg rolls down into the Old Woods! You must embark on the journey to save her fledgling form and return her to safety.

Instructions:

  • Use WASD to move the golem (player).
  • Use I and O to ready a musical note:
    • Don't hold down either to ready a STOP note.
    • Hold down O to ready a FOLLOW note.
    • Hold down I to ready a MOVE note.
    • Hold down both to ready a LISTEN note.
  • Use SPACE to play the readied note.

Note breakdown:

  • STOP - order the Phoenix to stay in place.
  • FOLLOW - order the Phoenix to move towards you.
  • MOVE - order the Phoenix to move 5 units in the direction that you're facing.
  • LISTEN - order the Phoenix to listen and repeat the next 4 notes that you play.
